alert.note: Alert for Big Stone (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 12:11AM CDT until August 06 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Big Stone County in west central Minnesota... Southern Roberts County in northeastern South Dakota... Northern Grant County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1211 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Marvin, or 8 miles southwest of Wilmot, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Corona and Twin Brooks around 1225 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Milbank, Lagoona Beach, Big Stone City and Ortonville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
